instructions: Indicate whether the pigeonhole principle can be used to prove the following statements.
question: A class of 11 students take a quiz that is worth 10 points. No partial credit is given, so every student received a score that is an integer. There must be at least two students who received the same score on the quiz.
explanation:
Correct

There are 11 possible outcomes of the quiz ranging from 0 to 10. Each of the 11 students could have gotten a different score on the quiz.
